heading: Tonight
text: Periods of clouds. Chance of a few light snow showers, especially over the Greens. Lows from just below zero into the single digits, with a few low teens in the south. Wind diminishing to less than 10 mph.

heading: Saturday
text: Variable clouds. Any snow showers ending. Highs from the single digits in the north, increasing into the teens and 20s as you head south. Northwest wind at 5 to 10 mph.

heading: Saturday Night
text: Partly cloudy early, then becoming mostly cloudy. An increasing chance of snow showers from the west overnight. Lows from the negatives to just above 0 in the north, to near 10 in the south. Northwest wind near 10 mph in the evening, diminishing to light and variable.
